title: Bug on build with adapter netlify

labels.name: p1-important
labels.description: SvelteKit cannot be used by a large number of people, basic functionality is missing, etc.

milestone.description: stuff we need to nail down before launch

body:
### Describe the bug

It doesn't build with the new version of adapter netlify. It's when building with edge functions that made a bug on build, building with classical functions still works

### Reproduction

Use there version
```
"@sveltejs/adapter-netlify": "1.0.0-next.73",
"@sveltejs/kit": "1.0.0-next.445",
```

Add this config to netlify adapter 
```
adapter: adapter({
  edge: true
})
```

And run `yarn build` or `npm run build`.

### Logs

```shell
❯ npm run build

> svelte-portfolio@0.0.1 build
> vite build

vite v3.0.9 building for production...
```
